00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGEROWIT24BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGEROWIT24BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageRowIterator24bp
00038 {
00043         class CIntermediateType
00044         {
00046                 UINT8** m_ppCurr;
00047                 public:
00049                 inline CIntermediateType(UINT8** ppCurr):m_ppCurr(ppCurr){}
00051                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(const CIntermediateType& Obj){*m_ppCurr=*Obj.m_ppCurr;return *this;}
00057                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(UINT32 Color){**m_ppCurr = (char)Color;*(*m_ppCurr+1)=(char)(Color>>8);*(*m_ppCurr+2)=(char)(Color>>16);return *this;};
00065                 inline operator UINT32(){return (UINT32)(*(UINT32*)(*m_ppCurr) & 0xffffff);}
00067                 inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return *(UINT32*)(*m_ppCurr+3*i) & 0xffffff;}
00068         };
00069 protected: // attributes
00071     UINT8* m_pCurr;
00073         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00076         CIntermediateType m_IntermediateType;
00077 public:
00083         inline CImageRowIterator24bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex);
00085         inline CImageRowIterator24bp& operator=(const CImageRowIterator24bp& It);
00088         inline CImageRowIterator24bp End() const;
00093         inline CImageRowIterator24bp& operator++() { m_pCurr+=3; return *this; }
00095         inline CIntermediateType& operator*(){return m_IntermediateType;}
00097         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return m_IntermediateType[i];}
00100         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q);
00103         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q);
00106         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q);
00107 };
00108 
00109 inline CImageRowIterator24bp::CImageRowIterator24bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex):
00110                 m_pEnd(pActualRow + MaxIndex*3), m_pCurr(pActualRow+StartIndex*3), m_IntermediateType(&m_pCurr)
00111 {
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 inline CImageRowIterator24bp& CImageRowIterator24bp::operator=(const CImageRowIterator24bp& It)
00116 {
00117         m_pCurr = It.m_pCurr;
00118         m_pEnd  = It.m_pEnd;
00119         m_IntermediateType = It.m_IntermediateType;
00120         return *this;
00121 }
00122 
00123 inline CImageRowIterator24bp CImageRowIterator24bp::End() const
00124 {
00125         CImageRowIterator24bp t = *this;
00126         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00127         return t;
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline bool operator==(const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q)
00131 {
00132         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline bool operator!=(const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q)
00136 {
00137         return !(p==q);
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline bool operator<(const CImageRowIterator24bp& p, const CImageRowIterator24bp& q)
00141 {
00142         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00143 }
